Title: Data Schema Freeze
Description: Define canonical symbols, intervals, adjustments, and corporate actions. ACCEPTANCE: Checksums and row-count parity across mirrored stores; Drift < 0.1% week-over-week; Schema documentation complete; Data dictionary published.

Title: Feed Watchdogs Setup
Description: Implement health checks for latency, gap detection, and source quorum. ACCEPTANCE: Alerts within 30s of missing bars; Auto backfill succeeds 3 consecutive runs; Monitoring dashboard live; Runbook for manual intervention.

Title: Baseline Models Implementation
Description: Build momentum, mean-reversion, regime classifiers, naÃ¯ve Bayes models. ACCEPTANCE: Reproducible runs with fixed seeds; Report ZIPs with plots and CSVs; Model cards documented; Performance metrics captured.

Title: Blind Backtests Execution
Description: Run time-sliced out-of-sample evaluations with embargo periods. ACCEPTANCE: No code access for validators; Results signed and timestamped; Audit trail stored in evidence locker; Independent verification documented.

Title: Accuracy Thresholds Definition
Description: Define pre-set cutoffs for trend, reversal, anomaly detection. ACCEPTANCE: Thresholds met in 3 independent datasets; P-values documented; Statistical methodology reviewed; Confidence intervals stated.

Title: Private Tester NDA Program
Description: Onboard testers under NDA with secure portal and feedback capture. ACCEPTANCE: 10 testers onboarded; Feedback variance analyzed; No PII leakage verified; NDA signed and filed.
Parent: M5: NDA Private Tester Program Ready

Title: Data Integrity Automation Job
Description: Nightly checksums, schema diffs, drift reports with auto-ticket on failure. ACCEPTANCE: Cron job scheduled and running; Tickets auto-created on failures; Retry logic implemented; Logs captured in observability platform.

Title: Benchmark Pipeline Automation
Description: Parameter grid runs, artifact bundling, hash-stamped reports linked to Linear. ACCEPTANCE: Pipeline triggers on schedule and on-demand; Artifacts uploaded to evidence locker; Linear issues updated with links; Regression alerts configured.

Title: Backtest Orchestrator
Description: Sliding windows, embargo logic, retries on transient errors, fail closed on regression. ACCEPTANCE: Embargo periods enforced; Transient errors retried (max 3 attempts); Metric regressions block progression; Human escalation on final failure.

Title: Evidence Locker Setup
Description: Immutable storage for PDFs/CSVs/plots with Linear issue attachments and hash recording. ACCEPTANCE: Storage bucket configured; Hash recorded in issue comments; Retention policy set; Access audit logging enabled.

Title: Gatekeeper Automation Rules
Description: Status automation blocking Validated unless evidence and tests pass. ACCEPTANCE: Linear workflow rules configured; Manual override requires approval; Audit log for state transitions; Documentation complete.
